_meta.update_notes: Based on CBRE, Cushman & Wakefield, Marcus & Millichap Q4 2025 reports. Office segmented by Class A/B/C.

rent_psf_monthly.source: Charlotte broker market data, Q4 2025 — avg asking rent ~$1,650/mo on ~890sf avg unit

stabilized_occupancy_pct.source: Charlotte multifamily occupancy trending from 91.6% (2024) toward 93% as supply tapers, Q4 2025

annual_rent_growth_pct.source: Charlotte rent growth forecast 2.5-3.5% as supply pipeline shrinks 40% YoY, Q4 2025

lease_up_months.source: Charlotte market standard for 150-250 unit projects, Q4 2025

other_income_per_unit_monthly.source: Parking, storage, pet fees — Charlotte market standard, Q4 2025

hard_cost_psf.source: Charlotte wood-frame multifamily construction cost, Q4 2025 — Southeast below national avg

soft_cost_pct_of_hard.source: Industry standard soft cost range 20-25% of hard, Charlotte market, Q4 2025

contingency_pct_of_hard.source: Standard contingency range 5-10%, Charlotte multifamily, Q4 2025

carry_cost_months.source: 18-month construction + 18-month lease-up, Charlotte market, Q4 2025

construction_loan_ltc_pct.source: Typical construction LTC for multifamily, Q4 2025 lending environment

construction_loan_rate_pct.source: SOFR + 275-325bps spread, Q4 2025 lending environment

construction_loan_term_months.source: Standard 3-year construction loan term, Q4 2025

equity_split_lp_pct.source: Typical LP/GP split 90/10, Fallon standard, Q4 2025

preferred_return_pct.source: LP preferred return, market standard for development deals, Q4 2025

promote_pct.source: GP promote above preferred return, Fallon standard, Q4 2025

exit_cap_rate_pct.source: Charlotte multifamily exit cap rate, Marcus & Millichap Q4 2025

exit_sale_cost_pct.source: Broker fees + transfer taxes, industry standard, Q4 2025

exit_year.source: Typical merchant developer hold period, Fallon standard
